presidentReport: Welcome everyone to the January meeting. We had a successful Field Day last year and looking forward to planning this year's event.
Our membership continues to grow with 3 new hams joining last month. I'd like to thank everyone who participated in the holiday social.
vicePresidentReport: The technical committee has been working on upgrading our repeater equipment. We've received quotes from three vendors and will be presenting recommendations at the next meeting.
Also planning a series of technical presentations for the spring.

report: The 2-meter repeater is operating normally. We performed maintenance on the backup power system.
The 70cm repeater needs a new duplexer filter which we've ordered.
Planning a Technician class for March. We have 12 pre-registered students.
Study materials have been ordered. Looking for volunteers to help with instruction.

oldBusiness: Field Day 2025 site selection - committee to report next month
Repeater upgrade funding approved - work to begin in February
Club website redesign - new site launched successfully
newBusiness: Proposal to sponsor local high school STEM club - approved
Summer picnic planning - June 20th tentative date
Request for club participation in emergency communications drill
announcements: Next VE session: February 5th at 10:00 AM
State convention registration now open - early bird discount until Feb 1st
Monthly breakfast: Every Saturday at 8:00 AM at Joe's Diner
Next board meeting: February 19th at 7:00 PM
